column4: Done what you said, I've unticked the Wireless Networking yet it's still hanging, and yes I have restarted the installation.
Done what you said, I've unticked the Wireless Networking yet it's still hanging, and yes I have restarted the installation.
based on your comment "my house is practically held up by my internet connection" - rfkill affects only the wireless hardware on your Ubuntu PC/laptop - not your household Internet modem
